text: Cassiani is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: * (1712-1778), Italian poet *Stefano Cassiani, Italian Baroque painter *Francisco Cassiani (born 1968), Colombian footballer *Geovanis Cassiani (born 1970), Colombian footballer *Edwin Cassiani (born 1972), Colombian boxer *Edgar Cassiani Perez (born 1981), Colombian footballer ==See also== *Cassiano (disambiguation) Category:Italian-language surnames fr:Cassiani it:Cassiani
title: Cassiani
